title: Boats to move O/L students affected by floods
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The G.C.E Ordinary Level examination ends on Wednesday (1).

Sri Lanka’s Commissioner General of Examinations responding to the circulation of photographs on social media showing O/L candidates sitting for the examination in flooded examination centers said that if such a situation is experienced the candidates can report to their closest examination center and sit for the paper.

He said that the boat services for the candidates are also in operation on Wednesday (1) under the guidance of the Disaster Management Center to transport the students to examination centers and back home.
